description: The ADVERSE_EVENT_OUTCOMES table contains the outcomes for adverse event records for a patient.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for an outcome associated with an adverse event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
